summary: Radix Bupleuri has been used widely for treatment of influenza, fever, inflammation, malaria, menstrual disorders, and hepatitis in china, Japan, Korea, and other Asian countries. in recent decades, investigations of Radix Bupleuri have focused on its biological activities. traditional uses Radix Bupleuri has been used as a famous traditional Chinese medicinal herb with a history of medical use in china. it is thought to regulate the exterior and interior metabolisms, disperse evil heat from superficies, sooth the liver, and promote yang and qi.
